cscie55.hw8

Class HW8P1

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configured
      • cscie55.hw8.HW8P1
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configurable, org.apache.hadoop.util.Tool

    public class HW8P1
extends org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configured
implements org.apache.hadoop.util.Tool
    This HW8P1 class is the proposed solution to HW8 Problem 1. It is a relatively minor change to HW7 Problem 3, DocWordIndex. HW8P1 keeps track, for each url, the tags associated with that url from the provided collection of json files. Ultimately, the reducer produces, for each url, the unique set, or union, of those tags.
    Author:
    John Quinn, CSCI E-55, Fall 2015

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  HW8P1.Link
      This Link inner class allows for HW8P and its other inner classes to perform various parse, get, set, and related methods of records, the url, the time stamp, and the tags for that url
      static class  HW8P1.Map
      This HW8P1$$Map inner class reads the inputPath and writes, with each url and, for each such url, the concatenated string of tags for it
      static class  HW8P1.PreviousKeyWord
      This PreviousKeyWord inner class allows for the HW8Pa$Reduce inner class to check (call) the previousKeyWord see and change (set) it if a new key word has been seen
      static class  HW8P1.Reduce
      This HW8P1$Reduce inner class accepts the key-value pairs from the Mapper class and writes, for each url, the set of unique (union of) tags for that url

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) static java.util.List<java.lang.String> allTags
      This allTags arraylist of strings collects, for each url, the tags associated with each instance of that url in the input data set
      (package private) static java.util.Set<java.lang.String> allTagsString
      This sllTagsString hashset collects, for each url, the string of the elements of tags by URL
      (package private) static java.lang.String oldPreviousKeyWord
      This string oldPreviousKeyWord is the concatenated string of the previous keyWords
      static HW8P1.PreviousKeyWord previousKeyword
      This in previousKeyWord allows for the tracking of the previousKeyWord through the inner class/object PreviousKeyWord to know when to change the key, the url
